00035     public VetClinic(String Name)
00036     {
00037         this.Name = Name;

00049     //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050     public boolean addDog(String name, String ID, String K9_family, String type )
00051     {
00052         if(ID.length() != 6 ) return false;
00053         
00054         for(int i=0; i < ID.length(); i++ )
00055             if( !Character.isDigit(ID.charAt(i))) return false; 
00056 
00057 
00058         Dog doggy = new Dog();
00059 
00060         doggy.ID=ID;
00061         doggy.type=type;
00062         doggy.setN(name,0);
00063         doggy.setK9_family(K9_family);
00064 
00065         Doglist[numDogs] = doggy;
00066         numDogs++;
00067         
00068         return true;
00069     }
00070     //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080     public boolean addCat(String name, String ID, String toy, String type )
00081     {
00082         if(ID.length() != 6 ) return false;
00083         
00084         for(int i=0; i < ID.length(); i++ )
00085             if( !Character.isDigit(ID.charAt(i))) return false; 
00086 
00087 
00088         Cat kitty = new Cat();
00089 
00090         kitty.ID=ID;
00091         kitty.type=type;
00092         kitty.setN(name,0);
00093         kitty.setFav_cat_toy(toy);
00094 
00095         Catlist[numCats] = kitty;
00096         numCats++;
00097         
00098         return true;
00099     }
00100     //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00101     public int numAnimals() { return numDogs + numCats; }
00102     public String getName() { return Name; }
00103     //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00108     public String listAll_animals()
00109     {
00110         String ret = "";
00111         int i=0;
00112         
00113         ret="Animal: Cats\n";
00114         for(i=0;i< numCats; i++)
00115             {
00116                 Cat c = Catlist[i];
00117                 ret += "\t ID: "+ c.ID +" Name: " + c.getN() + " Type: " + c.type 
00118                     +" Toy: " + c.getFav_cat_toy() +"\n";
00119             }
00120 
00121         ret+="\nAnimal: Dogs\n";
00122         for(i=0;i< numDogs; i++)
00123             {
00124                 Dog d = Doglist[i];
00125                 ret += "\t ID: "+ d.ID +" Name: " + d.getN() + " Type: " + d.type 
00126                     +" K9_family: " + d.getK9_family() +"\n";
00127             }
00128 
00129         return ret;
00130     }
00131     //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136     public String getAnimalInformation(String ID)
00137     {
00138         int i=0;
00139         if(ID.length() != 6 ) return null;
00140         
00141         for(i=0; i < ID.length(); i++ )
00142             if( !Character.isDigit(ID.charAt(i))) return null; 
00143 
00144 
00145         
00146         for(i=0;i< numCats; i++)
00147             {
00148                 Cat c = Catlist[i];
00149 
00150                 if(c.ID.equals(ID))
00151                     return "(CAT) ID: "+ c.ID +" Name: " + c.getN() + " Type: " + c.type 
00152                                +" Toy: " + c.getFav_cat_toy() +"\n";
00153             }
00154                 
00155 
00156         for(i=0;i< numDogs; i++)
00157             {
00158                 Dog d = Doglist[i];
00159                 
00160                 if(d.ID.equals(ID))
00161                     return "(DOG) ID: "+ d.ID +" Name: " + d.getN() + " Type: " + d.type 
00162                         +" K9_family: " + d.getK9_family() +"\n";
00163             }
00164 
00165         return null;
00166     }
00167     //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00168     private Cat Catlist[] = new Cat[10]; 
00169     private Dog Doglist[] = new Dog[10]; 
00170     private int numDogs = 0; 
00171     private int numCats = 0; 
00172     private String Name = "";
